template.name: Advanced
template.description: Advanced playlist with a lot of different options

parameter.name: Only include tracks after or equal to this year
Only include tracks before or equal to this year
Do not repeat tracks within same playlist
Include genres
parameter.data: select id,name,name from genres order by namesort asc

parameter.name: Exclude genres
parameter.data: select id,name,name from genres order by namesort asc

parameter.name: Only include tracks for selected artists
parameter.data: select contributors.id,contributors.name,contributors.name from tracks,contributor_track,contributors where tracks.id=contributor_track.track and contributor_track.contributor=contributors.id and contributor_track.role in (1,5) group by contributors.id order by contributors.namesort asc

parameter.name: Exclude tracks for selected artists
parameter.data: select contributors.id,contributors.name,contributors.name from tracks,contributor_track,contributors where tracks.id=contributor_track.track and contributor_track.contributor=contributors.id and contributor_track.role in (1,5) group by contributors.id order by contributors.namesort asc
